title: Guin Saga - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Amnesia   Aristocracy   Award-winning Work   Fantasy World   Kingdoms   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Special Abilities   Wars
author: Godai Yuu   Kurimoto Kaoru   Yoino Yume
description: In a single day and night of fierce fighting, the Archduchy of Mongaul had overrun its elegant neighbor, Parros. The lost priest kingdom’s surviving royalty, the young twins Rinda and Remus, hid in a forest in the forbidding wild Marches. There they are saved by a mysterious creature with a man’s body and a leopard’s head who has just emerged from a deep sleep and only remembers his name. Guin.>
